item.title: Architecting Large-Scale Search Solutions on GCP: Part 2 — Data Ingestion and Storage
item.description: Preview Architecting Large-Scale Search Solutions on GCP: Part 2 — Data Ingestion and Storage This section will examine a large-scale search architecture’s data ingestion and storage components. We’ll focus on efficiently handling high-volume data ingestion and reliably storing it using Google Cloud Platform services. To handle different data update patterns, we’ll use a combination of batch and streaming ingestion.

item.title: Turbocharging Python for Data Science with Numba
item.description: Preview Turbocharging Python for Data Science with Numba Python is powerful for data science, but it can struggle with heavy computations. Numba, an open-source JIT compiler, accelerates Python code by converting it into efficient machine code with minimal effort. By simply adding a decorator, Numba can significantly boost performance, making it ideal for numerical computations, custom algorithms, and real-time data processing, all while maintaining Python’s ease of use. In this article, you’ll learn how to use Numba with data science.
